'''''Ever Silent Stars''''' is the first act of [[Layla]]'s [[Hangout Event]]. In order to unlock this quest line, the player needs 2 [[Story Key]]s, must have completed {{Quest|Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises|showType=0}}, and reached [[Adventure Rank]] 40.

==Endings==
{{Hangout Event Endings
|character    = Layla
|act          = 1
|ending1      = That Which Remains Unspoken
|ending1_text = To keep a promise made to "her" means the breaking of a promise made to her. This is a tricky situation indeed.
|ending2      = The Price to Pay and Its Returns
|ending2_text = "I wish you courage as you carry onward, and hope that you fulfill the expectations you hold."
|ending3      = Once Bitten, Twice Shy
|ending3_text = Despite her incredibly weak disposition, she still chose to make a stand. Perhaps she wanted to prove a point, or perhaps she didn't want to leave regrets...
|ending4      = A Matter of Course
|ending4_text = Natural yet incredible, the unfolding of events will be etched in her memories for a long time to come...
|ending5      = The Stars' Expectations
|ending5_text = They will never meet, but "she" will always walk alongside her.
|ending6      = A Moment of Respite
|ending6_text = I wonder if she's exhausted, or if she's finally relaxed... Let's protect this precious moment for just a while longer.
}}

==Trivia==
* Layla's Hangout Event is the first to introduce a new gameplay mechanic, the Stress Value, which replaces the standard Heartbeat Value and represents her mental state throughout the quest. 
** Maxing out Layla's Stress Value is required to unlock certain interactions and endings.
